title: Reasonable Gun Control and the Real 2nd Amendment: A Conversation with Colin
description:
Guns are a pretty big part of America -- and Colin isn't going to let anyone change that.

Today's topic was submitted by MattMcDonald. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
